author: Network Vision Writers
title: Lindy Klim does a quick nudie run, shared on Instagram | Travel | Travel News and Deals | |
text:
TALK about shaking your money maker.
Celebrity mum, model and lifestyle blogger Lindy Klim’s beach body is key to her success — and she’s showing it off in all it’s glory as she takes a cheeky nudie run while spending time in Bali’s luxury Alila Villas Uluwatu.
Nudie run (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/54CPQbtIuN/embed .)
Hashtagging the cute snap “First ever nudie run” the mum of three bares some enviable tan lines in this very cheeky shot.
The Balinese princess wife of Australian Olympic gold medallist Michael Klim also loves to share pics of her glamorous island-hopping life, cute kids and impressive sixpack with her 73,000 followers.
Return to Bali (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/5Jiv2EtIv3/embed .)
Spending half her time in her tropical island home Klim, 37, recently told News Corp that despite the lengthy periods of separation from her husband and young children, Klim says she would not change a thing.
Klim sandwich (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/5wT2QzSb68/embed .)
'Cliff hugs' (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/53l4xetIoB/embed .)
Lindy and Michael celebrated their ninth wedding anniversary this year.
Island love (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/54JlRlyb9h/embed .)
Check out more of her insanely glamorous life.
Work it out (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/5G8l64NImT/embed .)
Mermaid beach (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/4-uGUHtIgu/embed .)
Maldives (Frame content direct link: https://www.instagram.com/p/4Q1Dl6tIr7/embed .)
